name: Puzzle Boxes
description:
Puzzle Boxes was my first student game, and thus is rather rough around the edges, but none the less functional and hopefully at least somewhat enjoyable.

Puzzle Boxes is a time based of sorts, in that you have to guide a ball  from one end of the box to the other, through and arrangement of obstacles.
There is also an endless mode, which, while functional is the place where my inexperience at the time shows the most.

How to Play:
- Use WASD or the arrow keys to rotate the box, to guide the ball to the finish zone.

Disclaimer: This is an old student project, and thus won't be receiving updates

TeamLukas HaakProgramming, Design, and Implementaion
